title: Introduction to Intent Protocol
summary: Discover the next generation of DeFi interaction where you express what you want, not how to execute it.
content:
What is Intent Protocol?

Intent Protocol is a revolutionary DeFi platform built on the Movement blockchain. Unlike traditional DEXs where you execute specific transactions against a smart contract, Intent Protocol allows you to sign an Intentâ€”a declaration of your desired outcome.

Why Intents?

Intents offer several major advantages over traditional transactions:

  • Gasless Experience: Makers (users) only sign messages. Solvers (relayers) pay the gas fees to execute the swap.
  • MEV Protection: By defining your output, you protect yourself from front-running and slippage beyond your limit.
  • Best Execution: Relayers compete to fill your order, ensuring you get the best market price available.

How to Use

Simply connect your wallet, select the 'Market' or 'Limit' tab, choose your tokens, and sign the intent. Ideally, your order will be filled instantly!
